item.title: The Mask 2 Return Chances Get Eager Response From Cameron Diaz After Jim Carrey's Recent Comments: "I've Been Riding Those Coattails From Day One"
item.description: Cameron Diaz responds to Jim Carrey's comments about a potential return in The Mask 2, expressing her eagerness to return to her breakout role.

item.title: 10 Movies That Wasted An Incredible A-List Actor
item.description: Just because a movie hires an A-List actor doesn't always mean they get it right, with many blockbuster films wasting the opportunity to do more.

item.title: The Animated Sequel I've Wanted For 11 Years Should Finally Happen After Disney's 2024 Success
item.description: Disney is on a roll with their animated sequels, and after success featuring movies that were almost a decade old, it's time revisit one more.
